name.description: Specifies the Name of the Private Service Connection. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the Name of the Resource Group within which the Private Endpoint should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the Subnet from which Private IP Addresses will be allocated for this Private Endpoint. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

is_manual_connection.description: Does the Private Endpoint require Manual Approval from the remote resource owner? Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
is_manual_connection.notes: If you are trying to connect the Private Endpoint to a remote resource without having the correct RBAC permissions on the remote resource set this value to `true`.

private_connection_resource_id.description: The ID of the Private Link Enabled Remote Resource which this Private Endpoint should be connected to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subresource_names.description: A list of subresource names which the Private Endpoint is able to connect to. `subresource_names` corresponds to `group_id`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

request_message.description: A message passed to the owner of the remote resource when the private endpoint attempts to establish the connection to the remote resource. The request message can be a maximum of `140` characters in length. Only valid if `is_manual_connection` is set to `true`.

private_ip_address.description: The private IP address associated with the private endpoint, note that you will have a private IP address assigned to the private endpoint even if the connection request was `Rejected`.

id.description: The ID of the Private Endpoint.

create.description: Used when creating the Private Endpoint.

update.description: Used when updating the Private Endpoint.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private Endpoint.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private Endpoint.
